HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How FytAI Works
HOW_IT_WORKS.SUBTITLE: Discover our transparent methodology and analysis process
HOW_IT_WORKS.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: FytAI is a decision support tool and does not replace the advice of a doctor, physiotherapist or other healthcare professional. Always consult a professional before starting a new sports program.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP1_DESC: We analyze 15 essential parameters of your profile, grouped into 3 categories:
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP2_DESC: Your data is analyzed by a specialized AI model that generates a personalized recommendation.
HOW_IT_WORKS.AI_EXPLANATION: Open-source language model trained to understand context and generate coherent recommendations. Hosted on HuggingFace.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP3_DESC: The AI compares your profile to our database of sports and activities:
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP4_DESC: You receive a complete recommendation with a concrete action plan.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CAPABILITY_1: Analyze your profile in a personalized way
HOW_IT_WORKS.CAPABILITY_2: Suggest sports adapted to your constraints
HOW_IT_WORKS.LIMITATION_4: Take into account all particular situations
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_1_DESC: We use known correlations between physical characteristics, personal preferences and suitable sports, combined with AI reasoning capabilities.
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_2_DESC: Each recommendation is generated individually for your profile. It's not just a multiple-choice questionnaire with pre-defined answers.
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_3_DESC: We are transparent: our system has not been validated by clinical studies. It's a decision support tool, not a medical diagnosis.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CTA_TITLE: Ready to discover your ideal sport?
HOW_IT_WORKS.CTA_DESC: Now that you understand our approach, get started!

EXAMPLES.TITLE: Result Examples
EXAMPLES.SUBTITLE: Discover what FytAI can recommend
EXAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Here are 5 typical profiles and their personalized recommendations. Click on a profile to see details.
EXAMPLES.WHAT_YOU_GET: What you'll get with your analysis
EXAMPLES.CTA_DESC: Convinced by these examples? Get your own personalized analysis.
EXAMPLES.MARIE_SITUATION: Office worker, sedentary for 5 years. Suffers from chronic lower back pain related to posture.
EXAMPLES.MARIE_WHY: Swimming is ideal because it works all back muscles without joint impact. Water supports body weight, allowing effective muscle work without pain.
EXAMPLES.THOMAS_SITUATION: Young stressed executive with 10h+ workdays. Wants to blow off steam but only has 30 minutes per day maximum.
EXAMPLES.THOMAS_WHY: HIIT allows significant results in very little time. Session intensity helps release accumulated stress while improving fitness.
EXAMPLES.SOPHIE_SITUATION: Active fifty-something suffering from knee osteoarthritis. Wants to maintain regular physical activity without worsening condition.
EXAMPLES.SOPHIE_WHY: Elliptical trainer reproduces natural walking movement without any shock. It allows cardio and muscle work while preserving knees.
EXAMPLES.LUCAS_SITUATION: Stressed manager, insomniac, with slightly elevated blood pressure. Looking for calming activity.
EXAMPLES.LUCAS_WHY: Yoga combines gentle physical exercise, breathing techniques and meditation. This holistic approach helps regulate the nervous system and improve sleep quality.
EXAMPLES.EMILIE_SITUATION: Dynamic student who finds classic sports boring. Loves music and wants to make friends.
EXAMPLES.EMILIE_WHY: Fitness dance combines the pleasure of music with physical exercise. Group atmosphere and choreography variety keep motivation high.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: All answers to your questions about FytAI
FAQ.Q1_QUESTION: Is the analysis really free? Will you spam me?
FAQ.Q1_ANSWER: Yes, FytAI is 100% free. We don't ask for your email and will never spam you. No registration is required to use the service.
FAQ.Q2_QUESTION: Why should I trust FytAI rather than a simple quiz?
FAQ.Q2_ANSWER: Unlike classic quizzes with pre-defined answers, FytAI uses real AI that analyzes your entire profile in depth to generate a unique recommendation. Each result is created specifically for you, taking into account your physical characteristics, goals and preferences.
FAQ.Q3_QUESTION: Who created FytAI? Are there doctors involved?
FAQ.Q3_ANSWER: FytAI was created by a team of developers passionate about sports and technology. We don't have doctors on the team, which is why we emphasize that our recommendations don't replace professional medical advice.
FAQ.Q4_QUESTION: What AI model do you use exactly?
FAQ.Q4_ANSWER: We use llama-3.3-70b-versatile, a powerful language model accessed via the Groq API. It's capable of understanding context and generating coherent recommendations based on your profile.
FAQ.Q5_QUESTION: Will the AI only recommend swimming and cycling?
FAQ.Q5_ANSWER: No! Our system can recommend over 50 different sports: from classic sports (swimming, running, cycling) to more original activities (climbing, dance, martial arts, team sports, etc.). The recommendation really depends on your profile.
FAQ.Q6_QUESTION: Has the AI been trained on medical data?
FAQ.Q6_ANSWER: The AI model we use has been trained on a wide variety of texts, including health and sports content. However, it's not a specialized medical model. That's why we always recommend consulting a healthcare professional.
FAQ.Q7_ANSWER: Your data is processed in real-time to generate your recommendation and is not stored permanently on our servers. We don't sell or share your personal information with third parties.
FAQ.Q8_QUESTION: Can I trust recommendations if I have a serious medical condition?
FAQ.Q8_ANSWER: No. If you have a serious medical condition (heart disease, recent surgery, severe osteoarthritis, etc.), you MUST consult a doctor before starting any physical activity. FytAI can give you ideas, but only a medical professional can validate their safety.
FAQ.Q9_QUESTION: Why do you ask so many questions?
FAQ.Q9_ANSWER: Each question helps the AI better understand your unique situation. The more information we have, the more accurate and personalized your recommendation will be. You can skip optional questions, but results will be less precise.
FAQ.Q10_QUESTION: Can I redo the test if I'm not satisfied with the recommendation?
FAQ.Q10_ANSWER: Absolutely! You can redo the analysis as many times as you want. Your answers might evolve, and you might discover different sports suited to your changing situation.
FAQ.Q11_QUESTION: Are my data sold to third parties?
FAQ.Q11_ANSWER: No, never. Your data is processed only to generate your recommendation and is not stored on our servers after analysis. We do not sell any data.
FAQ.Q12_QUESTION: How long is my data kept?
FAQ.Q12_ANSWER: Your form answers are saved locally in your browser to allow you to resume later. They are deleted as soon as you get your result. We do not keep any data on our servers.
FAQ.Q13_QUESTION: Can I trust these recommendations if I have serious pathologies?
FAQ.Q13_ANSWER: No, if you have serious pathologies, you must absolutely consult a doctor before starting any sports activity. FytAI is a decision support tool, not a medical diagnosis.
FAQ.Q14_QUESTION: What happens if the recommended sport doesn't suit me?
FAQ.Q14_ANSWER: We always provide alternatives! If the main sport doesn't suit you, explore the 3 other suggestions. You can also redo the test by adjusting your answers.
FAQ.HONESTY_1: We do not claim to have scientific or medical validation. FytAI is a technological tool, not a medical device.
FAQ.HONESTY_2: Our recommendations are AI-generated and may contain errors. Use your judgment and consult professionals if necessary.
FAQ.HONESTY_3: Our goal is to help you think and explore sports options, not to give you definitive prescriptions.
FAQ.CONTACT_US: Feel free to explore our other pages or start your analysis.

ABOUT.TITLE: About FytAI
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Discover who we are and why we created FytAI
ABOUT.STORY_P1: FytAI was born from a simple frustration: finding the right sport for yourself is often an obstacle course. Between conflicting advice, passing fads, and lack of personalization, many give up before even starting.
ABOUT.STORY_P2: We wanted to create a tool that truly takes into account who you are: your body, your schedule, your fears, your desires. Not a generic quiz, but a truly personalized analysis.
ABOUT.STORY_P3: FytAI is not perfect and we know it. It's a constantly improving project, guided by user feedback and our passion for making sport accessible to everyone.
ABOUT.VALUE_PRIVACY_DESC: Your data is never sold. It is processed locally and deleted after analysis.
ABOUT.VALUE_ACCURACY_DESC: We don't claim to replace a doctor. Our recommendations are suggestions, not prescriptions.
ABOUT.VALUE_TRANSPARENCY_DESC: We tell you exactly which AI we use and how our system works.
ABOUT.VALUE_FREE_DESC: FytAI is free, without ads, without spam, without mandatory registration.
ABOUT.TECH_INTRO: We believe you have the right to know exactly how our system works.
ABOUT.TECH_ANGULAR: Modern frontend framework for a smooth user experience
ABOUT.TECH_DOTNET: Robust and secure backend for data processing
ABOUT.TECH_AI: Open-source language model for personalized recommendations
ABOUT.AI_DISCLAIMER: This model generates recommendations based on your answers. It has not been specifically trained for medical sports advice.
ABOUT.LIMITATION_1: We are not a medical service and cannot diagnose or treat health conditions
ABOUT.LIMITATION_2: We do not have doctors or physiotherapists on our development team
ABOUT.LIMITATION_3: Our system has not been validated by clinical studies
ABOUT.LIMITATION_4: We cannot guarantee that our recommendations will suit you 100%
ABOUT.CONTACT_DESC: Check out our FAQ or try FytAI for yourself!
ABOUT.TEAM_DESC: A team passionate about sports and technology
